qst-older-child-introduction: These questions are for children like you who have cystic fibrosis. Your answers will help us understand what this disease is like and how your treatments help you. So, answering these questions will help you and others like you in the future.
qst-older-child-instructions: Please answer all the questions. There are no right or wrong answers! If you are not sure how to answer, choose the response that seems closest to your situation.
qst-older-child-section-demographic-intr: Please fill in the answer or check the box that matches your response to these questions.
qst-older-child-question-vacation: During the past two weeks, have you been on vacation or out of school for reasons NOT related to your health?
qst-older-child-question-race: Which of the following best describes your racial background?
qst-older-child-answer-race-g: Prefer not to answer this question
qst-older-child-question-grade: What grade are you in now? (If summer, grade you just finished)
qst-older-child-section-symptoms-introdu: Please check the box matching your response.
qst-older-child-question-1: You were able to walk as fast as others
qst-older-child-question-2: You were able to climb stairs as fast as others
qst-older-child-question-3: You were able to run, jump, and climb as you wanted
qst-older-child-question-4: You were able to run as quickly and as long as others
qst-older-child-question-5: You were able to participate in sports that you enjoy (e.g., swimming, soccer, dancing or others)
qst-older-child-question-6: You had difficulty carrying or lifting heavy things such as books, your school bag, or a backpack
qst-older-child-group-b: And during these past two weeks, indicate how often:
qst-older-child-question-13: You had bad dreams or nightmares
qst-older-child-question-16: You had to stop fun activities to do your treatments
qst-older-child-question-18: You are able to do all of your treatments
qst-older-child-question-20: You got together with friends a lot
qst-older-child-question-21: You stayed at home more often than you wanted to
qst-older-child-question-22: You felt comfortable sleeping away from home (at a friend of family member's house or elsewhere)
qst-older-child-question-24: You often invited friends to your house
qst-older-child-question-25: You were teased by other children
qst-older-child-question-26: You felt comfortable discussion your illness with others (friends, teachers)
qst-older-child-question-27: You thought you were too short
qst-older-child-question-28: You thought you were too thin
qst-older-child-question-29: You thought you were physically different from others your age
qst-older-child-group-d: Let us know how often in the past two weeks:
qst-older-child-question-32: You woke up during the night because you were coughing
qst-older-child-question-33: You had to cough up mucus
qst-older-child-question-37: You forgot to take your enzymes/pills
qst-older-child-question-39: You had felt burning in your throat
qst-older-child-question-41: You had trouble with your g-tube/MICKEY tube
qst-older-child-question-42: You had to go to bathroom many times a day (bowel movements)
qst-older-child-question-43: You have had a stuffy nose
qst-older-child-question-44: Your head has hurt (under your eyes or in you forehead)
qst-older-child-question-45: You have felt mucus dripping down your throat
